Packages that use org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.recoverylog.events

Classes in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.recoverylog.events used by org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.recoverylog
LogEntry
          This class defines a recovery log entry that needs to be stored in the recovery database.
LogEvent
          This interface defines a LogEvent that defines the profile of actions that manipulate the recovery log like logging a request.
 

Classes in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.recoverylog.events used by org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.recoverylog.events
LogEntry
          This class defines a recovery log entry that needs to be stored in the recovery database.
LogEvent
          This interface defines a LogEvent that defines the profile of actions that manipulate the recovery log like logging a request.
LogRequestEvent
          This class defines a LogRequestEvent to log a request log entry.
 

Classes in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.recoverylog.events used by org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.virtualdatabase.protocol

          This class defines a recovery log entry that needs to be stored in the recovery database.
